meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alexis Browsh Armen Terjimanian Jerry Slowik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6741.

td.p: Alexis Browsh, a teacher and tutor from Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania
Armen Terjimanian, a web content producer originally from Troy, Michigan
Jerry Slowik, a writer from Arlington Heights, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $49,998)

tr.td: FLYERS & FLYING
CALIFORNIA FOOD FESTIVALS
HIGH-SCORING SCRABBLE WORDS
THE 1970s
LOCO FOR LOGOS
"HAPPY" HOUR
